title: The 10% Brain Myth: You Already Use It All
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The 10% Brain Myth: You Already Use It All.

hook.text: 'We only use 10% of our brains.' If that were true, brain damage to the 'unused' 90% shouldn't matter.

climax.text: The brain consumes 20% of body energy despite being only 2% of body weight.
